title: The Girl from Finlay's River
description: Mairi left her home in Saskatchewan for the big city of Vancouver and a new start in life. It wasn't long before she fell in love with her boss, Philip Grenville. But where would that get her? After all, she was still "just a little farm girl." Why should he pay any attention to her when he already had the rich and beautiful Naomi Prentiss?
author: Elizabeth Graham
